releaseNotes:
[1.1.1]
        -Fix timeout for unknown location on iOS
        -Add PausesLocationUpdatesAutomatically for iOS
       [1.1.0]
        -Introduced AllowsBackgroundUpdates flag for iOS 9
        -Set default accuracy to 100
        
       [1.0.4]
       -Build against Android API 15 for better compat
       -Fix date time stamps so they are all UTC
       -Fix for Windows where default timeout could cause eception
summary: Easly access geolocation across Xamarin.iOS, Xamarin.Android and Windows. View full project page for README
title: Geolocator Plugin for Xamarin and Windows
